name: Gravity Android!
description:
You're an android, A-01.

You have been trapped inside a virtual testing facility for a new GRAVITY BELT device.

Use it to your advantage as you traverse the course in the shortest amount of time.

Gravity Android is a puzzle-platformer that hands the player control of the world gravity.

Game created by Mikolaj Brzuchalski for a 72 hour game jam, Mini Jam 63: Future

Controls:

Arrow keys to move.

Z to jump/continue.
